trans-unit.source: Enables you to indicate if the acceptance of an ordered item is to take place at the point of origin.

seg-source.mrk: Enables you to indicate if the acceptance of an ordered item is to take place at the point of origin.

target.mrk: 주문 품목의 수령이 출발지에서 이루어짐을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can indicate if the acceptance of an ordered item is to take place at the point of origin (that is, on the supplier's premises) by selecting <uicontrol>Origin Acceptance</uicontrol> for the specific item.

seg-source.mrk: You can indicate if the acceptance of an ordered item is to take place at the point of origin (that is, on the supplier's premises) by selecting <uicontrol>Origin Acceptance</uicontrol> for the specific item.

target.mrk: 특정 품목에 대해 <uicontrol>출발지에서 수령</uicontrol>을 선택하면 주문 품목의 수령이 출발지(즉, 공급업체의 소재지)에서 이루어짐을 나타낼 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you set the indicator, you must post the goods receipt to the valuated GR blocked stock using the movement type 107 as soon as the goods have been accepted at the supplier's facility. In a second step, you can post the goods from valuated GR blocked stock to unrestricted-use stock using movement type 109 as soon as the goods have been delivered by the supplier.

seg-source.mrk: If you set the indicator, you must post the goods receipt to the valuated GR blocked stock using the movement type 107 as soon as the goods have been accepted at the supplier's facility.
In a second step, you can post the goods from valuated GR blocked stock to unrestricted-use stock using movement type 109 as soon as the goods have been delivered by the supplier.

target.mrk: 이 지시자를 설정한 경우, 공급업체 시설에서 자재를 수령하는 즉시 이동 유형 107을 사용하여 입고를 평가 입고 보류 재고에 전기해야 합니다.
이어서 공급업체가 자재를 납품하는 즉시 평가 입고 보류 재고에 있는 자재를 이동 유형 109를 사용하여 가용 재고에 전기할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change this indicator in the item of the purchase scheduling agreement after you have posted a follow-on document (goods receipt, invoice receipt) for the item.

seg-source.mrk: You cannot change this indicator in the item of the purchase scheduling agreement after you have posted a follow-on document (goods receipt, invoice receipt) for the item.

target.mrk: 품목의 후속 문서(입고, 송장 수량)를 전기한 후에는 구매 일정 계약의 품목에서 이 지시자를 변경할 수 없습니다.
